headers.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.googleapis.com https://api.coingecko.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; connect-src 'self' https: wss: ws:; frame-src 'none';
